name: cgi-proxy
description: A proxy app for speed dev, you can use local html/js/css/img and remote http interface, but no access control problem
readme:
##1.show the config file path.


	cgi-proxy -c

###Config options
####RSCGIPrefix
	Real server interface prefix, if entire interface is 'www.test.com/getmoney',
	prefix is 'www.test.com'
	
####RSCGIMethod 
	No use, haha~~ I'll finish it soon
	
####extraCookie 
	You can add cookie for origin http request. 
	(exp : "skey=123123;haha=123123;")
####localResourceDir 
	Local static resource dir, for your html/css/img...
	(exp : "/Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/qqexpert/QQExpert")
####localListenPort 
	Local node proxy server port.
	(exp : 2222)
####localListenRouter 
	Local node proxy server router path, 
	you can access proxy server by "localListenRouter" and "localListenPort" 

    exp:
	"localListenPort" 2222
	"localListenRouter" cgibin

	Local node proxy cgi exp is '127.0.0.1:2222/cgibin/'+[interface name]
####specialProxy
    Special proxy interface list, you can appoint some interface's proxy rule, 
    most interfaces proxy to real server, some interfaces can use other test server
     
    exp:
    "getmoney": "http://127.0.0.1:3333/getmoney"

##2.start service
	cgi-proxy -s

start cgi-proxy service, the proxy url info will show in console...though it's in chinese

##3.contact

####You can contact me by email, the address is 43189612@qq.com
####This tool is for my team to do our daily work.... So, some code is customized and uncompleted, give me any advice to help me finish this tool.
